function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dengue importation driven by international air traffic","Impact":"Potential spread of dengue to new regions","Mitigation":"Early detection, rapid response, and effective control measures","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, early warning systems","People":"General public, public health practitioners, policy makers","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Difficulty in intercepting pathogen introduction through air traffic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease establishment and spread","Mitigation":"Integrated surveillance, early detection, rapid response","Technologies":"Integrated surveillance systems, early detection technologies","People":"General public, public health practitioners, policy makers","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Threat of vector-borne diseases to global public health","Impact":"Human and financial costs of potential epidemic","Mitigation":"Surveillance, awareness, exposure prevention, vector control","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, awareness campaigns, vector control technologies","People":"General public, public health practitioners, policy makers","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
